Name: Detriot
About the game: A political satire micro-management arcade game. Balance your time juggling a series of responsiblities in the ever chaotic City of Detroit, and see how long you can last! Compete for highscores in each of three gamemodes Choose to become a Woke revolutionary, a Cringe fencesitter, or a Based patriot, and venture boldly out into the world of Detriot Setup roadblocks to manage civil unrest on the city streets Share, Like, and Ban social media posts Vote like a contrarian or use your ballot to support diversity Wave the flag like a true patriot Relocate polling stations to favourable districts Protect the border from smugglers Tend the grill Bring both sides back to the negotiating table Stuff the ballot Protect the markets from inflation Playable with either mouse (point and click), keyboard (wasd/arrow keys and space/enter), or controller (left joystick and action buttons) Programmed by Cameron James Low Music by Daniel Brennan
Meta Title: Detriot: Sep 28, 2022, Cameron James Low and Full Overview
